newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Alltrista Q1 EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Alltrista Q1 EPS view cut.

text.p: -- Mesirow Financial Inc said Tuesday it reduced its Q1 earnings per share estimate on Alltrista Corp to $0.20 from $0.36, though it maintained its full-year EPS projection of $2.20.
-- It said three of Alltrista's businesses -- zinc products, Unimark Plastics and consumer products -- experienced less than expected sales volume during Q1.
-- Given the seasonal nature of the consumer products business and future order levels from the U.S. Mint, Alltrista believes it can make up the Q1 shortfall, Mesirow said.
